alert.note: Alert for Penobscot; Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 3:56PM EDT until June 04 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PISCATAQUIS AND NORTH CENTRAL PENOBSCOT COUNTIES... At 355 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Billy-Jack Depot to Baker Lake to Chamberlain Lake to 7 miles north of Telos Lake, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. These severe storms will be near... Chamberlain Lake, Baxter State Park and Tamway around 400 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
